name: "A Goldfish and his Friends" EP
description:
The physical release has arrived! A wonderful six song EP of WAV quality songs on beautiful CD-R compact disc with a printed paper sleeve in a clear, plastic cd case featuring a crocheted goldfish with each purchase!

Debut Release from Members of Gatsby's American Dream and Dr. Manhattan.

The long-distance musical project of Nic Newsham (Gatsby’s American Dream) and Nick Vombrack (Dr. Manhattan), PRINCESS DINOSAUR, looks to turn heads with the release of their debut EP, A Goldfish and his Friends.

While taking notes from their past musical endeavors and combining it with their love of calm-yet-intense bands like Brand New, As Cities Burn, and Owen, Princess Dinosaur’s debut EP is filled with subtle guitars, grooving rhythms, and honest lyrics making for a refreshing spin on the typical, acoustic spin-off band of singers past. A Goldfish and his Friends lyrically journeys through past mistakes and future concerns while stressing the importance of honesty, and most of all to live in the moment.

A Goldfish and his Friends tracklisting
1.     Oak Island
2.     Yeah Sure
3.     Steamy Dreamz
4.     Electricity
5.     Hares and Bears
6.     Scaring the Kids
